Statute.Title: Crown Corporations Dissolution Authorization Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Dissolution de sociétés d’État, Loi sur la)

CIF.Text: CIF, 1985, c. 41, ss. 1, 2, 6, 8 and 10 in force on assent 29.10.85; s. 7 proclaimed in force 14.08.87 see SI/87‑209, s. 9 proclaimed in force 11.09.87 see SI/87‑219, ss. 3 to 5 proclaimed in force 01.11.92 see SI/92‑211
